item.title: My First Post
item.description: First port Hi, this is Zheng Wei. I’m documenting my learning notes in this blog😉. 你好 我叫真伪 哈喽 访问我的网站 function helloWorld() { console.log('Hello, world!'); } ## nihao niaho def greet(name): print("Hello, " + name + "!") nihao
